backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining admin login with credential storage plus data models and maps for clients, transporters, loads, and tracking, including authorization and blob‑storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs for three admin‑authentication related features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend React components, hooks, pages, and layout files.
frontend/.gitignore: Git ignore rules for node modules, build outputs, environment files, IDE artifacts, and Capacitor Android/iOS paths.
frontend/ADMIN_ACCESS.md: Documentation of admin login flow, session token storage, and backend verification requirements for accessing admin routes.
frontend/ANDROID_BUILD.md: Guide for building Android APK/AAB files and preparing the app for Play Store deployment with required tools and steps.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration specifying app metadata, web directory, HTTPS scheme, and Android keystore build options.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and light/dark mode styles for the application UI.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app entry point into the #root container.
frontend/scripts/android/_signing-env.ex: Template environment file showing variables required for Android release signing.
frontend/scripts/android/build-debug-apk: Shell script that checks prerequisites, builds the web app, syncs Capacitor, and generates a debug Android APK.
frontend/scripts/android/build-release-a: Builds a signed Android App Bundle for Play Store, validating env vars, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle bundleRelease.
Builds a signed release APK for distribution, checking signing env vars, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle assembleRelease.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app with React Query, routing, theming, and a global toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/LocationEv: Displays submitted location evidence for a transporter, with timestamps, coordinates, and screenshot viewing.
frontend/src/components/admin/Transporte: Renders a list of transporters with details, status, recent location data, and stale checks.
Provides filters for hiding transporters without location and selecting truck type.
Shows transporters with location data in a simple map-like grid and allows selecting one to view details.
Loads transporter data, applies filters, and displays locations via map or list with fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSnippetPre: Renders an ad snippet inside an iframe with diagnostics for empty content or load errors.
frontend/src/components/ads/BottomAd.tsx: Displays a configurable bottom advertisement with dismissal and live settings updates.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with options to return home or log in as admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteE: Error boundary for admin routes that resets admin queries and shows a recovery UI.
Displays admin access error with retry and sign-out options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminSignIn: Prompts users to sign in with admin credentials to access restricted areas.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles user login/logout using Internet Identity with loading and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating a basic user profile with name and email submission.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Protects admin routes by verifying admin status, handling redirects, and showing error or loading states.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with links, coverage areas, and a dynamic year plus a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout combining top navigation, routed content, bottom ad, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Implements the responsive top navigation bar with links, login handling, and mobile menu toggling.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadIntere: Provides a dialog for uploading location evidence, including geolocation capture and image validation.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadLocati: Displays pickup and drop-off locations with icons when available.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Live: Shows live location sharing status and enables transporters to start or stop sharing their real-time location.
frontend/src/components/transporter/Tran: Allows transporters to view and update their operational status with validation and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/config/adminBootstrap.ts: Handles retrieval and comparison of the optional bootstrap admin principal from environment variables.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Stores ad configuration, default ad snippet, and utilities for loading and saving ad display settings.
frontend/src/constants/adminToken.ts: Defines shared constants for storing and tracking admin token changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Provides mutations to assign admin roles and bootstrap admin access, invalidating related role and profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminToken.ts: Tracks the admin token from sessionStorage and updates reactively when it changes via custom events.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Aggregates identity, admin token, profile, role, and admin checks to compute authentication and authorization state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains react-query hooks for backend operations such as contact messages, admin checks, client data, transporter data, and more.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransporterLiveLoc: Handles periodic geolocation updates for transporters, sending location data to the backend and managing errors and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching and updating the caller's user profile and role.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a corporate color palette for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company story, mission, values, and regional coverage using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements the admin dashboard with tabs for loads, transporters, clients, contacts, ads, and APK management using multiple data-fetching hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPasswordLoginPag: Provides an admin login form that authenticates via actor.adminLogin, stores a token, and verifies admin status before redirecting.
frontend/src/pages/ClientRegistrationPag: Handles client registration with form fields, existing info loading, contract submission, and verification status display.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form that submits messages to the backend and shows company contact information.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Renders a contracts dashboard allowing authenticated, verified users to post contracts and view existing ones, handling validation and submission via API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the landing page with hero content, marketing sections, and calls to action for client and transporter registration.
frontend/src/pages/LoadBoardPage.tsx: Provides a load board for clients to post loads and transporters to browse them, including file uploads, verification checks, and API-driven load actions.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a static services overview with descriptions of logistics offerings and a simple process explanation.
frontend/src/pages/TransporterRegistrati: Implements transporter registration and profile editing with document uploads, contract details, and truck type selection.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application’s route structure using TanStack Router, mapping URLs to page components and configuring hash-based navigation.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Converts an array of objects into CSV text, creates a Blob, and triggers a browser download with escaped values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using both query and hash routes plus sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and includes typography, container‑queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, and feature requirements related to fixing admin login and dashboard access flow.
